contact.about: Martin Kaller, swedish based landscape photographer sharing his photography journey. Photographs are shot with Sony A7II together with the FE 16-35 F4 or Canon 70-200 F4. To capture the wonder of the landscapes I enjoy being out before the sun is up. As the sun rises my camera is mounted on the tripod and I'm ready to capture the beauty of the scene. Usually my photographs are around water, I think it helps lift the composition. My goal is to share the beauty of nature and what it has to offer, as well as sharing some of my favorite spots mainly around Linköping but also the whole of Sweden.

legal: kallers.se use html5 localstorage, by saving location you also consent to let this website use localstorage

howto.title: Choose the images you want
howto.body: Click in the pictures you want, by default the pictures are selected in A3 with frame which is what I recommend

howto.title: Choose size and frame
howto.body: The price is governed by what size you choose. Frame can be added in white or black. By default, the frame is larger than pictured with a passport layout.

howto.title: Fyll i dina uppgifter
howto.body: The information is sent to me and I will contact you. If you are in Linköping, I personally deliver to you

prints.title: Welcome to my print shop
prints.body: My pictures often work best on paper. Of course, it gets even better framed in addition. I recommend the image size A3 with black frame and matte layout. In size A3, the images are printed locally in Linköping and become very fine quality. The price for this is 300 SEK. Check out the price table for other sizes! Is the size not included? Write what size you want in the comments section when filling in information and I will contact you and offer a price for this size.

warnings.text: This is not a real webshop, when you fill in the information they are sent to me and I will contact you. The payment is taken care of later
